---
title: Make Components
description: Create a reusable component for UI or logic to enhance modularity and consistency in the application.
---

## Command
Follow this command to create a new component.
```plaintext
lokio make:component
```

## Available
This command is available for:
- Fullstack nextjs
- Frontend nextjs

## Example
```plaintext
lokio make:component
Enter your component name: input
```

## Output
File will be created in `src/interfaces/components/input.component.tsx`
```plaintext
/**
 * @author lokio-cli
 * @generated at 2000-01-01 00:00:00
 * This file is generated by lokio CLI
 */


import type React from 'react';
import { Fragment } from 'react';
type InputProps = Record<string, never>

const InputComponent: React.FC <InputProps > = () => {
    return (
        <Fragment>
            <div>Your component</div>
        </Fragment>
    );
};

export default InputComponent;
```
